properties.name: Cape Romain National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Critical nesting habitat for sea turtles, bird rookeries
properties.conservation_focus: Sea turtle nesting beaches, migratory bird stopover
properties.endangered_species_list: Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Wood Stork; Piping Plover; Red Knot

properties.name: ACE Basin National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Historic rice plantation converted to wildlife habitat
properties.conservation_focus: Wading bird rookeries, fish spawning areas
properties.endangered_species_list: Wood Stork; Bald Eagle; American Alligator; Shortnose Sturgeon

properties.name: Santee National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Lake Marion ecosystem with cypress swamps
properties.endangered_species_list: Bald Eagle; Wood Stork; Prothonotary Warbler

properties.name: Pinckney Island National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Pristine barrier island with diverse habitats
properties.conservation_focus: Neotropical migrant birds, sea turtle nesting
properties.endangered_species_list: Painted Bunting; Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Wood Stork

properties.name: Savannah National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Restored rice plantation with managed water levels
properties.endangered_species_list: Wood Stork; American Alligator; Bald Eagle; Shortnose Sturgeon

properties.name: Congaree National Park
properties.description: Largest intact expanse of old growth bottomland hardwood forest
properties.conservation_focus: Old growth forest ecosystem, migratory birds
properties.endangered_species_list: Cerulean Warbler; Swainson's Warbler; Red-shouldered Hawk

properties.name: Francis Marion National Forest - Red-cockaded Woodpecker Sites
properties.description: Managed pine forests with active RCW colony sites
properties.endangered_species_list: Red-cockaded Woodpecker; Bachman's Sparrow; Brown-headed Nuthatch

properties.name: Hunting Island State Park
properties.description: Major sea turtle nesting beach with lighthouse
properties.endangered_species_list: Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Painted Bunting; Wilson's Plover

properties.name: Huntington Beach State Park
properties.description: Pristine beach with salt marsh and freshwater lagoon
properties.endangered_species_list: Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Least Tern; Black Skimmer

properties.name: Edisto Beach State Park
properties.description: Sea turtle nesting beach with interpretive center
properties.endangered_species_list: Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Least Tern; Painted Bunting

properties.name: Waccamaw National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Coastal plain ecosystem with carnivorous plants
properties.endangered_species_list: Red-cockaded Woodpecker; Venus Flytrap; Rough-leaved Loosestrife

properties.name: Bear Island Wildlife Management Area
properties.description: Important waterfowl and wading bird habitat
properties.endangered_species_list: Wood Stork; American Alligator; Painted Bunting

properties.name: Donnelley Wildlife Management Area
properties.description: Historic rice plantation with managed wetlands
properties.endangered_species_list: Wood Stork; Bald Eagle; American Alligator

properties.name: Gray's Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.description: Offshore limestone outcrop supporting diverse marine life
properties.conservation_focus: Marine ecosystem protection, right whale habitat
properties.endangered_species_list: North Atlantic Right Whale; Loggerhead Sea Turtle; Hawksbill Sea Turtle

properties.name: Kiawah Island - Loggerhead Nesting Beach
properties.description: High-density loggerhead sea turtle nesting area

properties.name: Folly Beach - Shorebird Sanctuary
properties.description: Important shorebird nesting and roosting area
properties.endangered_species_list: Least Tern; Black Skimmer; Wilson's Plover
